content.text:
Every outdoorsman has been there: you drive hours to a fishing hole only to find it's blown out. You hike to a trailhead that's been closed for weeks. You hunt public land without knowing where the boundaries are.

That ends now.

Avid Outdoorsman connects you with hunters, anglers, hikers, and outdoor enthusiasts in your area who share real-time updates about conditions, locations, and intel you can't find anywhere else.

REAL CONDITIONS. RIGHT NOW.

The internet is full of outdated trail reports from years ago. Weather apps give forecasts, not reality. Avid Outdoorsman shows you what's happening TODAY:

• Trail conditions: Muddy? Icy? Overgrown? Washed out?
• Stream levels: Can you cross? Is the spot accessible?
• Wildlife activity: What's moving? Where are people seeing game?
• Fishing reports: What's biting? What depth? What lure?
• Access points: Which roads are gated? Which are open?

Real people. Real locations. Real time.

DISCOVER THE UNMARKED

The best spots aren't on Google Maps. They're local knowledge—passed down, stumbled upon, or hard-earned.

With Avid Outdoorsman, that knowledge gets shared:

• Hidden trails not on any map
• Secret fishing holes where locals go
• Camping spots away from crowds
• Game trails and feeding areas
• Water sources and creek crossings

Users drop pins with photos and descriptions. Access spots you'd never find on your own.

MAPS BUILT FOR THE BACKCOUNTRY

• High-resolution satellite imagery
• Topographic contour lines for elevation
• BLM and National Forest boundaries
• Private property lines (stay legal, stay safe)
• Trail overlays from OpenStreetMap
• Custom markers with privacy controls
• Location search to scout new areas

No more wondering if you're trespassing. No more getting lost.

WEATHER THAT MATTERS

• 7-day and 24-hour forecasts
• UV index and moon phases
• Hourly temperature and precipitation
• Wind speed and direction
• Sunrise and sunset times

Plan smarter, not harder.

KNOW THE LAWS

Complete hunting and fishing season database for all 50 states:

• Season dates by species
• Bag limits and possession rules
• Licensing requirements
• Filter by state and activity

No more digging through DNR PDFs.

YOUR OUTDOOR NETWORK

• Follow local outdoorsmen within 5-100 miles
• See posts from nearby users
• Like, comment, and save updates
• Direct message for beta on specific areas
• Share success stories with photos
• Build your profile and connect

SPOT REVIEWS & RATINGS

• 5-star ratings for trails, fishing holes, campsites
• Difficulty ratings (easy, moderate, hard)
• Photo galleries from real visitors
• Detailed reviews with tips and warnings

PRIVACY YOU CAN TRUST

• Your exact coordinates never shared publicly
• No ads. No trackers. No selling your data.
• Delete your account anytime—data gone permanently.

Built by outdoorsmen, for outdoorsmen.

WHO IS THIS FOR?

Hunters, anglers, hikers, campers, kayakers, mountain bikers, overlanders, backpackers—if you spend weekends outside, this app is for you.

DOWNLOAD NOW. HIT THE TRAIL SMARTER.

Stop wasting gas on closed trails. Stop fishing blown-out creeks. Stop hunting spots that got logged last year.

Get the real story from real people who were just there.

    *   Integrate high-resolution satellite imagery and topographic contour lines.
    *   Add functionality to drop pins with photos and descriptions.
3.  **Modify `app/(tabs)/profile.tsx`:**
    *   Implement the User Profile Screen.

4.  **Modify `app/(tabs)/_layout.tsx`:**

    *   Save the landmark.
